document_data.name: Zenobia
document_data.mainbody: '''Zenobia''' was a [[dwarf]] [[fighter]] from the world of [[Oerth]] who, along with her companions, was sent to [[Toril]] after angering an evil [[mage]].
document_data.Description: Zenobia had long, braided blonde hair, and a substantial blonde beard. She was clad in [[chain mail]], and wore a voluminous dark red cloak.
document_data.Possessions: She owned a pair of [[gauntlets of ogre power]], which magically enhanced her strength, and allowed her to carry twin [[warhammer]]s in combat.
document_data.Activities: Along with her similarly transported companions, Zenobia worked as an adventurer in the name of goodness. She hoped to grow powerful enough to return home to Oerth.
